from HTMLParser import HTMLParser   
    class MLStripper(HTMLParser):
        def __init__(self):
            self.reset()
            self.fed = []
        def handle_data(self, d):
            self.fed.append(d)
        def get_data(self):
            return ''.join(self.fed)
    def strip_tags(html):
        s = MLStripper()
        s.feed(html)
        return s.get_data()
